text: Pascal Rambeau (born 14 April 1972) is a French sailor. He won a bronze medal in the Star class with Xavier Rohart at the 2004 Summer Olympics. ==External links== * Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:People from Vitry-sur-Seine Category:French male sailors (sport) Category:Olympic bronze medalists for France Category:Olympic medalists in sailing Category:Star class world champions Category:Sailors at the 2000 Summer Olympics – Soling Category:Sailors at the 2004 Summer Olympics – Star Category:Sailors at the 2008 Summer Olympics – Star Category:Medalists at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:World champions in sailing for France Category:Sportspeople from Val- de-Marne
title: Pascal Rambeau
